title: 可唔可以幫手睇下依條list

replies.msg:
https://uk.pcpartpicker.com/list/

CPU
AMD Ryzen 7 3700X 3.6 GHz 8-Core Processor

Motherboard
Gigabyte X570 AORUS ELITE ATX AM4 Motherboard

Memory
Corsair Vengeance RGB Pro 32 GB (2 x 16 GB) DDR4-3200 Memory

Storage
ADATA XPG SX8200 Pro 512 GB M.2-2280 Solid State Drive

Case
Corsair Crystal 460X RGB ATX Mid Tower Case

Power Supply
FSP Group 650 W 80+ Silver Certified ATX Power Supply

平時多用黎玩R6 PUBG 同埋會同一時間開好多野... 想問依條list可唔可以玩高清高FPS 同埋推唔推到1440/144 既mon
同埋仲有咩野要加
暫時睇依條list好似1萬左右 quota可以上到萬3左右
第一次砌機 好多野都唔識

video card
Gigabyte GeForce RTX 2060 SUPER 8 GB WINDFORCE OC Video Card

打機用.....
落返3600同埋16gb ram 睇下上唔上到2080s好過啦
6c12t打機都夠做
